data.name: Crystal
data.description: A member of the Inhuman royal family, Crystal's mastery of the elements makes her a versatile Blaster.

starItems.name: Crystal
starItems.description: A member of the Inhuman royal family, Crystal's mastery of the elements makes her a versatile Blaster.

1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Always apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
3.nextUpgrade: Repeat this attack an additional time

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional times.
5.nextUpgrade: Repeat this attack an additional time

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.

Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional times.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>75%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies with <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage. If an enemy has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, they take <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to all summoned enemies.

1.description: If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character or an <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal them for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>15%</color>

2.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character or an <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal them for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect.

On Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.

3.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character or an <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal them for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects.

On Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: Reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

4.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character or an <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal them for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects.

On Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

5.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character or an <color=#fff568>INHUMAN</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, heal them for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects.

On Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
